## Lesson 6: Model Refinement

---

<center>

<a href = "https://certara.github.io/R-RsNLME/index.html"><img src='img/RsNLME.png'  align="left" style = "height: 150px; padding-right: 10px;"/></a>

In Lesson 6, we will explore model refinement. You will learn how to create a new model with parameter estimates from a previously executed
model. We will then add covariates into our new model and explore their impact using model diagnostic plots.


<br></br>
<br></br>
<br></br>


### Live Webinar Date: 9/28/2022 @10am EST

In the webinar we will cover the following topics:

* Using the [`copyModel()`](https://certara.github.io/R-RsNLME/reference/copyModel.html) function to create a new model with parameter estimates from the fitted base model
* Adding covariates and fitting additional covariate models
* Exploring covariate effects using model diagnostic plots
